comments: Following the pick, Smart (BOS) makes marginal hand to hand contact with Adebayo (MIA) as he rolls to the rim.
At the end of his drive, Dragic (MIA) does not extend his forearm or deliver contact to Theis (BOS) as he releases from the contact.
Theis (BOS) jumps to the side to contest the shot attempt by Dragic (MIA) and marginal foot to foot contact occurs when Dragic extends his foot forward following his release.
Theis (BOS) establishes himself in a screening position in Butler's (MIA) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Theis (BOS) establishes himself in a screening position in Crowder's (MIA) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Adebayo (MIA) is in the paint for less than three seconds when he is imminently exiting.

Brown (BOS) and Dragic (MIA) engage and disengage during the scramble for the loose ball.  The Replay Center confirms the on-court ruling that Dragic was the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.
During the rebound, Tatum (BOS) reaches for the ball and marginal body contact with Herro (MIA) occurs.

During the inbound, Butler (MIA) cleanly deflects the pass away from Brown (BOS) and any follow-through body contact, after the deflection, is deemed incidental. Butler reestablishes himself inbounds before gaining possession of the ball.
Walker (BOS) maintains a legal guarding position during the play at the basket by Crowder (MIA).
After the successful field goal attempt, Smart (BOS) inadvertently touches the ball which then rolls off of his body.
Crowder (MIA) establishes himself in a screening position in Tatum's (BOS) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Adebayo (MIA) maintains a legal guarding position and absorbs the contact from Smart (BOS) underneath the basket.
As Tatum (BOS) engages on the pick by Crowder (MIA), marginal arm contact occurs when they disengage.
Prior to slipping the pick, Theis (BOS) places a resting hand on Crowder's (MIA) arm that does not affect his FOM.
At the end of the drive, Theis (BOS) maintains a legal guarding position on Dragic (MIA) and any foot to foot contact is deemed incidental.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Brown (BOS) maintains a legal guarding position on Butler (MIA) as he bobbles the pass and fumbles the ball out of bounds.
Theis (BOS) establishes himself in a screening position in Butler's (MIA) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
During the rebound, Crowder (MIA) reaches for the ball to tip it out and marginal contact with Theis' (BOS) arm occurs.
Brown (BOS) commits a take foul on Adebayo (MIA).
Brown (BOS) attempts to steal the ball and marginal contact occurs to Butler's (MIA) arm.
Walker (BOS) commits a take foul on Butler (MIA).
During the inbound, Butler (MIA) cleanly deflects the entry pass away and any follow-through body contact, after the deflection, is deemed incidental.
During the defensive switch, Kanter (BOS) turns to obtain post position and marginal contact with Adebayo (MIA) occurs.
